sentence.idiomatic: She always says that she can't find clothes that fit her well.
The basic requirement for wearing a suit is that it fits well.
It's only been a year and this skirt already doesn't fit me well.
Do you have any bigger sizes?
This isn't the right size of pants for me. Do you have a smaller pair?
What’s your clothing size?
You are the expert so you need to teach me.
I am not an expert. I can only know a little.
Ask her these questions, she is the expert.
The teacher suggested that we read more books.
The doctor recommended that he should quit smoking.
She suggested that I study German.
These fabrics wrinkle easily, they're not very good.
Be careful, you don't want to wrinkle your clothes.
When the clothing is wrinkled it looks bad.
Different textured clothing has different characteristics.
Everyone knows that wearing pure cotton fiber clothing is very comfortable.
These real silk fiber skirts are very popular.
Depending on the material used, the price of the clothing will be different.
These materials are good.
What material is this clothing made of?
We have all sorts of fabrics here. You can take your time and pick one out.
I looked at a lot of places, but I just couldn't find the kind of fabric that you wanted.
You can use this fabric to make clothing.
Do you make custom-made clothing here?
I got this pair of shoes custom-made.
I want to have a tailor made suit.
What style of skirt do you like?
There are so many styles. I don't know which one to buy.
We have every style of clothing here.
I don't like this skirt.
These dresses aren't very nice.
She wants to buy a white skirt.
Your suit is very nice.
This shop has a lot of suits.
He bought a suit.
Sir, I would like to get a suit made, and also get a skirt made for my wife.
No problem, satisfaction is guaranteed. A lot of people come to me to get their clothing made. Did you bring an example of what you want? Or do you want me to design it?
Oh, I have an example of what I want. Let me choose the fabric. I want something a little bit thicker, to wear in the cold weather.
Sure. The wool I have here is very good. Here, feel it. It’s very soft!
Hmm, it’s definitely very nice. Is this kind of material suitable for making a suit?
This kind is the most suitable. The texture is good, and it doesn't wrinkle easily. I suggest that we make your wife's skirt out of the same material, but in a different color.
Hmm, you’re the expert. I’ll listen to you. How soon can you finish it?
About a week. But if you are in a rush then I can do it a little bit quicker. However, the price will be higher.
Don’t worry, I’m not in a rush. Here are the style and the measurements, you can just make it according to these and it should be fine.

No problem. Don’t worry. Everyone says that the clothing I make is very good. However, since we are making a suit, it would still be best if I take your measurements again, to ensure a proper fit. Do you have time?
Hmm, you’re right. Let’s take the measurements now then.
